oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-07-14 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from July 14, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer), guest performers the Davis Sisters, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Lew Childre, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Del Wood; Minnie Pearl; Davis Sisters; Chet Atkins; Faron Young
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Crazy (Del Wood) -- Faron Young introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Davis Sisters -- Lonely And Blue (Davis Sisters) -- Faron Young introduces Chet Atkins -- Avalon (Chet Atkins) -- Savings Bonds P.S.A. (Grant Turner) -- Faron Young talks -- Until I Met You (Faron Young) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Faron Young) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Wood, Del; Atkins, Chet; Childre, Lew, 1901-1961; Davis Sisters (Country music group); Davis, Skeeter; Young, Faron
